statements.name: PROC GANNO
statements.description: Identifies the Annotate data set and draws the graphics output defined by that data set. It can also scale the output to accommodate data-dependent coordinate values and specify an output catalog.

arguments.name: ANNOTATE=
arguments.description: specifies a data set that includes Annotate variables that identify graphics commands and parameters.

arguments.name: DATASYS
arguments.description: indicates that absolute or relative data-dependent coordinates occur in the Annotate data set and scales the coordinates to fit the graphics output area.

arguments.name: DESCRIPTION=
arguments.description: specifies a description of the output.

arguments.name: GOUT=
arguments.description: specifies the SAS catalog in which to save the graphics output produced by the GANNO procedure.

arguments.name: IMAGEMAP=
arguments.description: creates a temporary SAS data set that is used to generate an image map.

arguments.name: NAME=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the GRSEG catalog entry and the name of the graphics output file, if one is created.
